0.name: Lioneye's Watch
0.flavourtext: Cold, dank and reeking of infection. That's how Hope fares in Wraeclast.

2.name: The Coast
2.flavourtext: The cliffs echo the hungry madness.

3.name: The Tidal Island
3.flavourtext: Despite the warming sun, the breeze here bites with fangs of ice.

4.name: The Mud Flats
4.flavourtext: Mud and air seethes with warped life.

7.name: The Submerged Passage
7.flavourtext: Slime, shadow, and sharp sharp teeth.

8.name: The Ledge
8.flavourtext: Dusty winds laden with the scent of bone, old and otherwise.

9.name: The Climb
9.flavourtext: The cliffs glower down like judges in session.

10.name: The Prison
10.flavourtext: The air is rich with despair and apparition.

11.name: Prisoner's Gate
11.flavourtext: The cliffs watch with goatish eyes.

12.name: The Ship Graveyard
12.flavourtext: Whispered agonies of the marooned dead.

14.name: Merveil's Caverns
14.flavourtext: The air needles the skin with its frigid fury.

15.name: Act 2
15.flavourtext: DEV NOTE: Off map pip for Way Forward quest

16.name: Act 2
16.flavourtext: DEV NOTE: Off map pip for Way Forward quest

17.name: The Forest Encampment
17.flavourtext: A remnant of civility in the wild.

19.name: The Old Fields
19.flavourtext: Sick pastures, feverish to the touch.

20.name: The Den
20.flavourtext: Hot and sour as the panting of a rabid bear.

21.name: The Crossroads
21.flavourtext: Life struggles where once it bloomed.

22.name: The Crypt
22.flavourtext: Stones worn smooth by centuries of devotion.

24.name: The Broken Bridge
24.flavourtext: A pure, soothing river once red and clogged with the victims of war.

25.name: The Riverways
25.flavourtext: Once tamed rivers now running free.

27.name: The Western Forest
27.flavourtext: Bathed in the cool light of obsession.

30.name: The Wetlands
30.flavourtext: Corrupted waters, pouring from the Mantle above.

33.name: The Fellshrine Ruins
33.flavourtext: The ground aches with desecration. The rain tastes of blight.

34.name: The Sarn Encampment
34.flavourtext: The forging ground of heroes, past and present.

35.name: The City of Sarn
35.flavourtext: A harsh light on harsh sights.

36.name: The Slums
36.flavourtext: Only the wind whistles and whines here now.

38.name: The Marketplace
38.flavourtext: All the money in the world can't stop a world from ending.

39.name: The Catacombs
39.flavourtext: Coughing up the dust of dead devotion.

40.name: The Battlefront
40.flavourtext: Charred flesh and spilled bowels. Sweet and sour.

41.name: The Solaris Temple Level 1
41.flavourtext: An empire at its height, reflected in polished gold.

42.name: The Solaris Temple Level 2
42.flavourtext: An empire at its height, reflected in polished gold.

43.name: The Docks
43.flavourtext: Life pales in the wake of progress.

44.name: The Sewers
44.flavourtext: What horrors lurk in the bowels of the city?

47.name: The Imperial Gardens
47.flavourtext: Nature outgrows the designs of Man.

48.name: The Library
48.flavourtext: All the knowledge in the Empire could not save them.

49.name: The Sceptre of God
49.flavourtext: The pinnacle of power. The height of hubris.

50.name: Highgate
50.flavourtext: A frail scab of hope holds Nightmare at bay.

51.name: The Aqueduct
51.flavourtext: The rushing lifeblood of a long-dead Empire.

52.name: The Dried Lake
52.flavourtext: Bones of betrayal, ashes of purity.

54.name: The Crystal Veins
54.flavourtext: Gifts of the Beast, awaiting plunder.

55.name: Kaom's Dream
55.flavourtext: Fury and flame come to life.

57.name: Daresso's Dream
57.flavourtext: No matter how far you climb, you never escape the Pits.

61.name: The Ascent
61.flavourtext: The greater the rise, the greater the fall.

62.name: Overseer's Tower
62.flavourtext: Vengeance is the slave's ultimate reward.

63.name: The Slave Pens
63.flavourtext: In Oriath's darkest corner, the spark of rebellion ignites.

64.name: The Control Blocks
64.flavourtext: The illusion of control is swiftly severed by the blade of reality.

65.name: Oriath Square
65.flavourtext: What was once the heart of the city is now the heart of the battle.

66.name: The Ruined Square
66.flavourtext: Oriath's bleeding heart is the main course in a terrible feast.

67.name: The Templar Courts
67.flavourtext: Only those with faithful eyes may enter these solemn chambers unbidden.

68.name: The Torched Courts
68.flavourtext: Fuelled by blood and chaos, a dark inferno engulfs the halls of justice.

69.name: The Chamber of Innocence
69.flavourtext: In this holiest of sanctums, the High Templar communes with God and delivers His divine judgement.

70.name: The Ossuary
70.flavourtext: The faithful dead watch over the city with hollow eyes.

71.name: The Reliquary
71.flavourtext: A trove of shameful relics displayed with pride.

72.name: The Cathedral Rooftop
72.flavourtext: Atop this burning monument to arrogance, Oriath's final hope remains.

73.name: Lioneye's Watch
73.flavourtext: The shivering tides bring little hope, only desperation and despair.

74.name: The Twilight Strand
74.flavourtext: Those that now wash ashore seek no warmth or shelter, only to fill a bottomless void of pain and hunger.

75.name: The Coast
75.flavourtext: The Ancestors return to conquer these shores once again.

76.name: The Tidal Island
76.flavourtext: As the tide rises, hope is drowned.

77.name: The Mud Flats
77.flavourtext: Mud and blood make a fine war paint.

78.name: The Karui Fortress
78.flavourtext: The waters here, once stagnant and foul, now run clear with an ancient bloodlust.

79.name: The Ridge
79.flavourtext: The air is thin, the way is narrow.

80.name: The Prison
80.flavourtext: Echoes of the past bring new life to an old experiment.

81.name: Prisoner's Gate
81.flavourtext: The hunting grounds of a cloven god.

82.name: The Western Forest
82.flavourtext: What madness flitters and creeps through the darkened trees?

83.name: The Riverways
83.flavourtext: These violent waters carry portents of death.

84.name: The Wetlands
84.flavourtext: A corpulent grub flails mindlessly, infesting the putrescent muck.

85.name: The Southern Forest
85.flavourtext: Insidious pupa populate under sweltering heat.

86.name: The Cavern of Anger
86.flavourtext: Stalactites drip in mourning for an ocean queen.

87.name: The Beacon
87.flavourtext: An echo of destiny consumes the land.

88.name: The Brine King's Reef
88.flavourtext: A coral throne for a salt-soured god.

89.name: The Bridge Encampment
89.flavourtext: Surviving rodents cling tight to cracks found in the masonry.

90.name: The Broken Bridge
90.flavourtext: The stonework trembles atop this petrified land.

91.name: The Crossroads
91.flavourtext: Ancient cruelty tears through the cobbled intersection.

92.name: The Fellshrine Ruins
92.flavourtext: A spirit of sadism blemishes the earth.

93.name: The Crypt
93.flavourtext: Ancestral memories given life, then soured.

94.name: The Chamber of Sins
94.flavourtext: Decrepit ruins born again. A lusting evil stalks its halls.

95.name: Maligaro's Sanctum
95.flavourtext: The inner depths of decadent darkness.

96.name: The Den
96.flavourtext: Sodden spores flourish and feast on decaying flesh.

99.name: The Dread Thicket
99.flavourtext: Dripping with anger and grief, the ancient thicket weeps.

101.name: The Vaal City
101.flavourtext: Ancient and arcane, a civilisation lost to the dust of history.

102.name: The Temple of Decay
102.flavourtext: Arachnoid servants dribble and drool, coveting pilgrim flesh to feed abhorrent desires.

103.name: The Sarn Ramparts
103.flavourtext: A parapet shakes beneath a billowing sky.

104.name: The Sarn Encampment
104.flavourtext: A shaky peace descends, though swords will never rest.

105.name: The Toxic Conduits
105.flavourtext: Spells of blood foul the waters below.

106.name: The Grand Promenade
106.flavourtext: A favourite walk of noble lords, now fallen into disrepair.

107.name: The High Gardens
107.flavourtext: Creeping dread chokes life from this thriving terrace.

109.name: The Lunaris Concourse
109.flavourtext: Allegiances falter like the waning of the moon.

110.name: The Lunaris Temple
110.flavourtext: Gibbous beauty eclipsed by a sisters' feud.

111.name: The Quay
111.flavourtext: The restless dead shift 'neath darkened waters.

112.name: The Grain Gate
112.flavourtext: A barrier trembles before undying feet.

113.name: The Imperial Fields
113.flavourtext: The savagery of war stains both muck and mire.

114.name: The Solaris Concourse
114.flavourtext: Conquered by the fog of war.

115.name: The Solaris Temple
115.flavourtext: Luminary flares extinguished by burning pride.

116.name: The Harbour Bridge
116.flavourtext: A dark unrest sends ribbons to war.

117.name: The Blood Aqueduct
117.flavourtext: A mighty spillway tainted by tarrish blacks and sanguine reds.

118.name: Highgate
118.flavourtext: Survivors huddle 'neath baleful shadows of rot and decay.

119.name: The Descent
119.flavourtext: A freezing drop to test one's resolve.

120.name: The Vastiri Desert
120.flavourtext: Blustering sand, sharper than a bandits' blade.

121.name: The Oasis
121.flavourtext: A paradise hidden amongst sunbleached bones and blistering dunes.

122.name: The Foothills
122.flavourtext: The secrets of history lie hidden among layers of dirt and sand.

123.name: The Boiling Lake
123.flavourtext: These corrosive waters devour both flesh and bone.

124.name: The Tunnel
124.flavourtext: Unspeakable horrors filigree and haunt the nameless dark.

125.name: The Quarry
125.flavourtext: A monstrous terror stalks chthonic mines, yearning for the boundless sky.

126.name: The Refinery
126.flavourtext: Madness was visited upon those who dug too deep.

127.name: The Belly of the Beast
127.flavourtext: Once flushed with the warmness of blood, now festering; consumed by fungal rot.

128.name: The Rotting Core
128.flavourtext: The putrid interior oozes and spoils.

129.name: Oriath Docks
129.flavourtext: A final refuge, backed hard against the waves of a raging sea.

130.name: The Cathedral Rooftop
130.flavourtext: From above, the true scope of carnage is clearly espied.

131.name: The Ravaged Square
131.flavourtext: A flourishing place of trade, barely recognizable amidst the countless deaths.

132.name: The Torched Courts
132.flavourtext: Pious priests once dealt cruel justice within these halls, now they both smoulder in silent agony.

133.name: The Desecrated Chambers
133.flavourtext: Mad men toil under smoking skies to pervert a holy sanctum.

134.name: The Canals
134.flavourtext: A man-made rupture from which both blood and water flow.

135.name: The Feeding Trough
135.flavourtext: Cries of torment and pathetic moans as the unholy banquet of flesh continues.

136.name: The Reliquary
136.flavourtext: Empty, broken shelves linger, looted and forgotten in the wake of this horrid war.

137.name: The Ossuary
137.flavourtext: The dead offer thanks, for they have been spared this final savagery.

138.name: Oriath
138.flavourtext: A new dawn rises on ruined stone. Hand in hand, those that remain toil for a better world.

139.name: The Templar Laboratory
139.flavourtext: Thaumaturgists once sought ever greater knowledge. Now they run and hide like all the others.
